TopicTitle: Mod for changing fuel type on fuel containers

Articles.Content:
Hello,

First poster here. Been playing the game for a while now and I'm kinda frustrated you can't swap the fuels around in the different fuel containers. Eg. switch Oxidizer with Liquid Fuel.

Thus I wonder if there's a mod that lets you swap fuel types to your desire.

Thanks in advance.
Stock Fuel Switch or Modular Fuel Tanks.
Interstellar Fuel Switch - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/117932 and (I think) Fire spitter has one http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24551
